attributes.title: King of Mario Kart
attributes.caption: Gus and Eric join Kyle and Cole for some Mario Kart Fun!
attributes.description: Gus and Eric join Kyle and Cole for some Mario Kart Fun!

attributes.title: Modded Stardew Valley
attributes.caption: You ever commit a crime so bad you had to move? Have you ever committed a crime so bad that the entire town had to move with you?
attributes.description: You ever commit a crime so bad you had to move? Have you ever committed a crime so bad that the entire town had to move with you?

attributes.title: New Kitchen, Same Cooks
attributes.caption: Josh, Kyle, Cole, and Sam are so close to the end they can taste it but are they actually close to an end or a new beginning?
attributes.description: Josh, Kyle, Cole, and Sam are so close to the end they can taste it but are they actually close to an end or a new beginning?

attributes.title: Dang it, Bobby!
attributes.caption: Lindsay joins Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Josh for some Dead By Daylight mayhem while also doing their best King of the Hill impressions.
attributes.description: Lindsay joins Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Josh for some Dead By Daylight mayhem while also doing their best King of the Hill impressions.

attributes.title: Grandpa Lied!
attributes.caption: Turns out it was Tax Evasion Farms not Tax Shelter Farms
attributes.description: Turns out it was Tax Evasion Farms not Tax Shelter Farms

attributes.title: Growing Stonks
attributes.caption: Everybody has their eye on the farm while Sam has his eye on GME.
attributes.description: Everybody has their eye on the farm while Sam has his eye on GME.

attributes.title: Undertaker has a name?
attributes.caption: The gang are mining and farming as usual until Chris has his mind blown.
attributes.description: The gang are mining and farming as usual until Chris has his mind blown.

attributes.title: Valheim
attributes.caption: Josh, Kyle, Cole, and Sam jump into the hot new game everyone has been talking about.
attributes.description: Josh, Kyle, Cole, and Sam jump into the hot new game everyone has been talking about.

attributes.title: Texas Snowpocalypse Aftermath
attributes.caption: The gang have been through one hell of a week.
attributes.description: The gang have been through one hell of a week.

attributes.title: The Elder
attributes.caption: Sam, Cole, Reid, Josh and Kyle make their way into the Blackforest to fight The Elder.
attributes.description: Sam, Cole, Reid, Josh and Kyle make their way into the Blackforest to fight The Elder.

attributes.title: The Flower Dance
attributes.caption: It's time for the Flower Dance once again! But for the first time, in this new town. That is totally not the other town that owes a bunch of taxes.
attributes.description: It's time for the Flower Dance once again! But for the first time, in this new town. That is totally not the other town that owes a bunch of taxes.

attributes.title: Into the Swamp
attributes.caption: The gang needs iron and for that they need to venture into the swamp but first they need to find it.
attributes.description: The gang needs iron and for that they need to venture into the swamp but first they need to find it.

attributes.title: New Farmer on the Block
attributes.caption: Melanie joins the gang and learns about the fate of Tax Shelter Farm.
attributes.description: Melanie joins the gang and learns about the fate of Tax Shelter Farm.

attributes.title: Taylor's Trench
attributes.caption: The base the gang built is land locked and they can't get their boats back but Kyle has a plan and it involves a little geological engineering.
attributes.description: The base the gang built is land locked and they can't get their boats back but Kyle has a plan and it involves a little geological engineering.

attributes.title: Chris Hates Valheim
attributes.caption: Kyle's computer crashed, daylight savings time has started, dogs and cats are living together. It's bedlam right from the start.
attributes.description: Kyle's computer crashed, daylight savings time has started, dogs and cats are living together. It's bedlam right from the start.

attributes.title: Bonedaddy
attributes.caption: The gang have one job and that is to kill Bonemass but to get this job done they need a new boat. She's majestic, she's speedy and most importantly, she's thicc. All aboard Queen Ann's Dump Truck
attributes.description: The gang have one job and that is to kill Bonemass but to get this job done they need a new boat. She's majestic, she's speedy and most importantly, she's thicc. All aboard Queen Ann's Dump Truck

attributes.title: William Shatner's Birthday
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are celebrating some March Birthdays down at the Luau.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are celebrating some March Birthdays down at the Luau.

attributes.title: Baby Park
attributes.caption: Jon Risinger and Blaine Gibson join Kyle, Josh, and Cole for some Mario Kart fun! Well, as long as Kyle's internet holds out that is.
attributes.description: Jon Risinger and Blaine Gibson join Kyle, Josh, and Cole for some Mario Kart fun! Well, as long as Kyle's internet holds out that is.

attributes.title: People Love Salads
attributes.caption: Poor Reid, she is out here giving everybody literal gold nuggets and no one likes her. It's too bad she didn't give anyone a salad, people love salads. I bet someone would spend ten grand on salads if they could.
attributes.description: Poor Reid, she is out here giving everybody literal gold nuggets and no one likes her. It's too bad she didn't give anyone a salad, people love salads. I bet someone would spend ten grand on salads if they could.

attributes.title: Dead by Daylight
attributes.caption: Kyle, Reid, Sam, and Melanie are doing their best to stay alive but Cole keeps hitting them with CD's.
attributes.description: Kyle, Reid, Sam, and Melanie are doing their best to stay alive but Cole keeps hitting them with CD's.

attributes.title: Deep Rock Galactic w/ echochlo
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, and Melanie are joined by echochlo to mine some asteroids and kill some bugs.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, and Melanie are joined by echochlo to mine some asteroids and kill some bugs.

attributes.title: Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay
attributes.caption: The crew have been working their tails off trying to get the farm ready for the next season so I don't ya think they earned some time to relax and go fishing?
attributes.description: The crew have been working their tails off trying to get the farm ready for the next season so I don't ya think they earned some time to relax and go fishing?
attributes.display_title: Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay

attributes.title: Bonus Stream
attributes.caption: What's this? Another episode on the same day? Is it Christmas?!
attributes.description: What's this? Another episode on the same day? Is it Christmas?!

attributes.title: Among Us w/ friends!
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, Sam, Chris, and Josh are joined by Jon Risinger, Kdin, Jacob, Ky, and echochlo for some murder and betrayal on the new Among Us map.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, Sam, Chris, and Josh are joined by Jon Risinger, Kdin, Jacob, Ky, and echochlo for some murder and betrayal on the new Among Us map.

attributes.title: A Pirate Threesome
attributes.caption: Bonks for everyone who read that title and thought of something naughty; this is clearly referring to three pirates and their comedy act. Off to horny jail with all of you.
attributes.description: Bonks for everyone who read that title and thought of something naughty; this is clearly referring to three pirates and their comedy act. Off to horny jail with all of you.

attributes.title: Clue/Cluedo
attributes.caption: Cole, Sam, Noel, Barbara, and Jeremey try to figure out who is a murder and who is the murder-e. Murdery? Victim, someone is the victim.
attributes.description: Cole, Sam, Noel, Barbara, and Jeremey try to figure out who is a murder and who is the murder-e. Murdery? Victim, someone is the victim. Although I gotta be real, I think Noel is trying harder than the others. Maybe it's the hat but I feel like he really wants to figure out this mystery.

attributes.title: First Class Trouble
attributes.caption: While a malfunctioning A.I. tries to take down this space cruise our intrepid voyagers will have to unlock all the doors to get to the A.I. 's core BUT there are some saboteurs in the group that will try to stop them.
attributes.description: Oxygen is important, especially in space! So while a malfunctioning A.I. tries to take down this space cruise our intrepid voyagers will have to unlock all the doors to get to the A.I. 's core BUT there are some saboteurs in the group that will try to stop them. Who could these betrayers be? Kyle, Trevor, Matt, Cole, Josh, or Sam?

attributes.title: More First Class Trouble!
attributes.caption: Melanie, Cole, Reid, Sam, Josh, and Jeremy are trying to figure out who the humans are and who are the evil personoids that are trying to kill everyone. Oh yeah and the oxygen, can't forget about that, kinda need that to live.
attributes.description: Melanie, Cole, Reid, Sam, Josh, and Jeremy are trying to figure out who the humans are and who are the evil personoids that are trying to kill everyone. Oh yeah and the oxygen, can't forget about that, kinda need that to live.

attributes.title: Among Us: Town of Us
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, Josh, and Sam are joined by Steffie, Tay, Eddie, Jeremy and Chad for some Among Us fun using the Town of Us extra roles mod!
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, Josh, and Sam are joined by Steffie, Tay, Eddie, Jeremy and Chad for some Among Us fun using the Town of Us extra roles mod!

attributes.title: First Class Trouble w/ First Class Kerry
attributes.caption: Kerry joins Kyle, Sam, Cole, Melanie, and Josh for some more First Class Trouble!
attributes.description: Kerry joins Kyle, Sam, Cole, Melanie, and Josh for some more First Class Trouble!
attributes.display_title: First Class Trouble w/ First Class Kerry

attributes.title: Worms W.M.D
attributes.caption: Cole, Melanie, Josh, and Chris try to kill each the only way a worm can, with every weapon known to man and also a donkey statue.
attributes.description: Cole, Melanie, Josh, and Chris try to kill each the only way a worm can, with every weapon known to man and also a donkey statue.

attributes.title: Mario Party
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Chris play a BOLD game of Mario Party.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Chris play a BOLD game of Mario Party.

attributes.title: First Class Trouble w/ CheesyBlueNips
attributes.caption: Special Guest CheesyBlueNips joins Kyle, Cole, Melanie, Sam, and Chris to sort out the humans from the personoids in First Class Trouble.
attributes.description: Special Guest CheesyBlueNips joins Kyle, Cole, Melanie, Sam, and Chris to sort out the humans from the personoids in First Class Trouble.

attributes.title: Back on the Farm!
attributes.caption: After a bit of a hiatus from the farm the crew is back and ready to get back to work. That is if Snoop Dog would just stop smoking them out because nobody can see anything with all of this "fog" around.
attributes.description: After a bit of a hiatus from the farm the crew is back and ready to get back to work. That is if Snoop Dog would just stop smoking them out because nobody can see anything with all of this "fog" around.

attributes.title: Dead By Daylight w/ Ky!
attributes.caption: Ky joins Melanie, Cole, Kyle and Sam for some Dead by Daylight shenanigans.
attributes.description: Ky joins Melanie, Cole, Kyle and Sam for some Dead by Daylight shenanigans.

attributes.title: Stardew Valley: Reset the Timeline
attributes.caption: All they want to do is get to the fall festival and something keeps happening to prevent our heroes from getting there but that won't stop Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Sam because they know how to time travel. Hopefully they don't mess up the timeline too much.
attributes.description: All they want to do is get to the fall festival and something keeps happening to prevent our heroes from getting there but that won't stop Kyle, Cole, Reid, and Sam because they know how to time travel. Hopefully they don't mess up the timeline too much.

attributes.title: The Sims: Three Dudes
attributes.caption: Three Dudes was streamed in front of a live "studio" audience.
attributes.description: Three Dudes was streamed in front of a live "studio" audience.

attributes.title: The Sims: Three Dudes & Melanie
attributes.caption: Season 2 of Three Dudes starts off with a new house mate! Melanie joins the fun but once she starts her new job it starts to cause problems for Cole and his "career" choice.
attributes.description: Season 2 of Three Dudes starts off with a new house mate! Melanie joins the fun but once she starts her new job it starts to cause problems for Cole and his "career" choice.

attributes.title: Modded Stardew Valley: Spirit's Eve!
attributes.caption: Spirit's Eve is upon us so put on your best costume and try not to get lost in the maze.
attributes.description: Spirit's Eve is upon us so put on your best costume and try not to get lost in the maze.

attributes.title: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion
attributes.caption: There are only two things certain in life, death and taxes. Apparently this little Turnip didn't get the memo because he has not paid any of his taxes to Mayor Onion.
attributes.description: There are only two things certain in life, death and taxes. Apparently this little Turnip didn't get the memo because he has not paid any of his taxes to Mayor Onion. Now he must collect taxes from the other dead beats around town on the Mayor's behalf and what better way to collect taxes than with a sword?

attributes.title: Mario Party: Fortune Favors...
attributes.caption: THE BOLD! Chris returns for some bold strategies against Sam, Kyle and Reid is more Mario Party fun! For those of you who were watching on stream you know Select All had to end early before the last turn, this video has the exciting conclusion.
attributes.description: THE BOLD! Chris returns for some bold strategies against Sam, Kyle and Reid is more Mario Party fun! For those of you who were watching on stream you know Select All had to end early before the last turn, this video has the exciting conclusion.

attributes.title: Golf with your Friends
attributes.caption: Reid, Melanie, Cole, and Josh face off in some chaotic golfing fun!
attributes.description: Reid, Melanie, Cole, and Josh face off in some chaotic golfing fun!

attributes.title: Minecraft
attributes.caption: Josh, Kyle, Sam and Cole have joined the RT shared server and they have an island of their very own to build on and explore. Now let's see how long it takes before they destroy their own portal back to the hub world.
attributes.description: Josh, Kyle, Sam and Cole have joined the RT shared server and they have an island of their very own to build on and explore. Now let's see how long it takes before they destroy their own portal back to the hub world.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Josh's Hole
attributes.caption: On this episode of Minecraft, Josh "digs" a hole, Kyle learns to read, and Sam becomes a scientist.
attributes.description: On this episode of Minecraft, Josh "digs" a hole, Kyle learns to read, and Sam becomes a scientist.

attributes.title: Back 4 Blood Beta!
attributes.caption: Chris, Melanie, Kyle, and Cole have some "cleaning" to do and some Ridden to kill in the beta for Back 4 Blood, a zombie survival fps made by the original Left 4 Dead creators!
attributes.description: Chris, Melanie, Kyle, and Cole have some "cleaning" to do and some Ridden to kill in the beta for Back 4 Blood, a zombie survival fps made by the original Left 4 Dead creators!

attributes.title: Minecraft: Into the Nether
attributes.caption: On this episode of Minecraft, Chris joins the server, Josh forges some equipment, and Kyle makes an American Sized Nether Portal.
attributes.description: On this episode of Minecraft, Chris joins the server, Josh forges some equipment, and Kyle makes an American Sized Nether Portal.

attributes.title: The Sims: Pizza Pie
attributes.caption: On this episode of Three Dudes and Melanie, the gang saves up enough money to get a new kitten but later on all hell breaks loose when Cole gets a little too comfortable around his house mates.
attributes.description: On this episode of Three Dudes and Melanie, the gang saves up enough money to get a new kitten but later on all hell breaks loose when Cole gets a little too comfortable around his house mates.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Twilight Forest
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Sam and Kyle make a portal, Cole fights a goblin, and Josh loses his shoes.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Sam and Kyle make a portal, Cole fights a goblin, and Josh loses his shoes.

attributes.title: GeoGuessr
attributes.caption: Chelsea joins Josh, Chris, Kyle, and Cole to see who knows their geography the best with just a couple of street view pictures to go by.
attributes.description: Chelsea joins Josh, Chris, Kyle, and Cole to see who knows their geography the best with just a couple of street view pictures to go by.

attributes.title: Minecraft: The Smeltery
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets a horse, Chris builds a house, and Sam accidentally hurts himself.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets a horse, Chris builds a house, and Sam accidentally hurts himself.

attributes.title: LIFE
attributes.caption: Noel joins Mel, Kyle, and Cole for a game of LIFE and as it turns out LIFE is all about money.
attributes.description: Noel joins Mel, Kyle, and Cole for a game of LIFE and as it turns out LIFE is all about money.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Big Snake
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Sam makes a gun, Kyle triggers a trap, and Cole and Josh find a very big snake.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Sam makes a gun, Kyle triggers a trap, and Cole and Josh find a very big snake.

attributes.title: Bigfoot
attributes.caption: What did you do with your labor day vacation? Chris, Cole, Reid, and Kyle decided to go camping but I wouldn't consider this your run of the mill, regular kind of camping trip.
attributes.description: What did you do with your labor day vacation? Chris, Cole, Reid, and Kyle decided to go camping but I wouldn't consider this your run of the mill, regular kind of camping trip. Unless you think hunting Bigfoot IS a regular kind of camping trip then I would really like to know what your childhood was like.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Buster Boys
attributes.caption: In this week's episode of Minecraft, Cole fights a Lich, Sam fights a Yeti, and we get an answer to this question, is Josh a horse duper?
attributes.description: In this week's episode of Minecraft, Cole fights a Lich, Sam fights a Yeti, and we get an answer to this question, is Josh a horse duper?

attributes.title: Splitgate
attributes.caption: Kyle, Josh, Cole, and Chris are getting sweaty in this high octane, ultra twitchy shooter and you know what goes well with sweat? Portals.
attributes.description: Kyle, Josh, Cole, and Chris are getting sweaty in this high octane, ultra twitchy shooter and you know what goes well with sweat? Portals.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Aurora Palace
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole shears a sheep, Josh dies, and Kyle finds a penguin.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole shears a sheep, Josh dies, and Kyle finds a penguin.

attributes.title: The Sims: Party Time!
attributes.caption: The Three Dudes and Melanie finally have a day off so you know what that means right? It's time to party!
attributes.description: The Three Dudes and Melanie finally have a day off so you know what that means right? It's time to party!

attributes.title: Minecraft: Nether Fortress vs The Railgun
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh deletes Sam, Cole builds a drill, and Kyle builds a portal.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh deletes Sam, Cole builds a drill, and Kyle builds a portal.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft: Nether Fortress vs The Railgun

attributes.title: Minecraft: Into the Labyrinth!
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets deleted, Sam defuses a chest, and Cole starts a corporation.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets deleted, Sam defuses a chest, and Cole starts a corporation.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Search for the Warped Forest
attributes.caption: This week in Minecraft, Kyle and Cole go on an expedition, Josh fires his gun, and Sam makes wood fit for Bowser's castle.
attributes.description: This week in Minecraft, Kyle and Cole go on an expedition, Josh fires his gun, and Sam makes wood fit for Bowser's castle.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft: Search for the Warped Forest

attributes.title: Minecraft: Big Buff Cow Men
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole disarms a trap, Kyle drowns himself, and Reid tries to chat up a Minotaur.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole disarms a trap, Kyle drowns himself, and Reid tries to chat up a Minotaur.

attributes.title: Minecraft: One Tough Hydra
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Kyle gets some new boots, Sam talks about eggs, and Cole gets his skin ripped off while Josh shoots a three headed, snake-dragon.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Kyle gets some new boots, Sam talks about eggs, and Cole gets his skin ripped off while Josh shoots a three headed, snake-dragon.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Josh's Tower
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh tries to fly, Cole does the same, and Sam looks at some clouds.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh tries to fly, Cole does the same, and Sam looks at some clouds.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Ky's in the Server!
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh places some tricks, Cole places some treats, and Ky joins the server for some Halloween fun!
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh places some tricks, Cole places some treats, and Ky joins the server for some Halloween fun!

attributes.title: Minecraft: Ocean Water
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh mines some Diamond, Cole has computer issues, and Sam does a live review of Sonic Hard Seltzer.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh mines some Diamond, Cole has computer issues, and Sam does a live review of Sonic Hard Seltzer.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Scavenger Hunt
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh makes a cube, Kyle makes a bigger cube, then Cole and Sam get down with the Party Wither.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh makes a cube, Kyle makes a bigger cube, then Cole and Sam get down with the Party Wither.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Beacons and Diamonds
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh digs for diamonds, Kyle builds a beacon, then Sam and Cole settle a score.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Josh digs for diamonds, Kyle builds a beacon, then Sam and Cole settle a score.

attributes.title: Minecraft: The Village Hidden in Sam's Head
attributes.caption: On this week's episode of Minecraft: Sam is on vacation, while Kyle, Cole, and Josh build a big head.
attributes.description: On this week's episode of Minecraft: Sam is on vacation, while Kyle, Cole, and Josh build a big head.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft: The Village Hidden in Sam's Head

attributes.title: Minecraft: The End Dragon
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole swings his sword, Kyle fires some arrows, Josh climbs a tower, and Sam gazes upon a visage of himself.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, Cole swings his sword, Kyle fires some arrows, Josh climbs a tower, and Sam gazes upon a visage of himself.

attributes.title: Minecraft: Elytra for All!
attributes.caption: On this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets an Elytra, Cole gets an Elytra, Sam gets an Elytra, and Kyle...also gets an Elytra but not before planning to burn down every cedar tree.
attributes.description: On this episode of Minecraft, Josh gets an Elytra, Cole gets an Elytra, Sam gets an Elytra, and Kyle...also gets an Elytra but not before planning to burn down every cedar tree.

attributes.title: Naughty Coal Mining
attributes.caption: In this episode of Minecraft, it's a race to see how much coal Kyle, Josh, Cole and Sam can get before they deliver it to all the naughty people on the server.
attributes.description: In this episode of Minecraft, it's a race to see how much coal Kyle, Josh, Cole and Sam can get before they deliver it to all the naughty people on the server.
